title: Perma ban for 3rd Aprty Programms???!!!
body: Hey guys. MY account just got perma banned for 3rd party programms but i actually never used anything like this!!! All i use for LoL is op.gg to check my opponents and also some times to spectate games when im too lazy to spectate over the client. Anyone any idea why it could have happened??? Allready sended a ticket to Riot...

DId you let anyone else use your account?

He was "banned" because he accidentally triggered the matchmaking algorithm that detects boosting. At the time, he was playing particularly well, so he tripped it up thinking it was someone else playing on his account.

He got unbanned because of the fact that his match history correlates with his stream times with 100% of his games being streamed, thereby proving he was the one playing on his account the whole time.
